title: Random Cat
description: Retrieve a random cat fact, extract the first word from the fact, and then use it to search for a cat image using the cat API and return the image URL. The fact should be displayed in the UI.
requests: Create and start entrypoint of React without template.
From the first word of the fact, retrieve a random cat image from `https://cataas.com/cat/says/`.
Create a button to generate a new fact and image.
Separate the logic of the app into separate files.
Refactor with Custom Hook for the logic.
